text: The Blue Swords began as a senior international figure skating competition in East Germany. First time in 1984 the competition was organised only for junior skaters. The 1986 edition was held November 13–15 in Karl-Marx-Stadt. Medals were awarded in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles and pair skating. ==Men== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Rank ! Name !
